changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "subscription" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "trial_ends_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "current_period_start_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "current_period_end_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "canceled_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "currency" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "price_cents" INT NOT NULL, "stripe_customer_key" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "stripe_subscription_key" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "organization_id" UUID NOT NULL, "plan_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("plan_id") REFERENCES "plan" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("organization_id", "plan_id") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_subscription_plan_id" ON "subscription" ("plan_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_subscription_current_period_end_active" ON "subscription" ("current_period_end_at") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "current_period_end_at" IS NOT NULL;
